abstract.t: This draft specifies a fault management indications for MPLSTransport Profile(MPLS-TP) Label Switched Paths (LSPs). Thenotification mechanism employs a generic method for a Maintenance EndPoint (MEP) or Maintenance Intermediate Point (MIP) to indicate afault on an MPLS-TP LSP. A new MPLS Operation, Administration, andMaintenance (OAM) message is defined.
